cleaned_text: Program provides personalized integrative medicine and supportive care through the patient's course of treatment, from diagnosis through survivorship. Our licensed acupuncturists offer acupuncture, acupressure, aromatherapy, and mind-body practices to adult oncology patients. Integrative Medicine sessions are scheduled before or after infusions, in a new dedicated suite adjacent to the infusion areas. These therapies are designed to alleviate disease or treatment side-effects including pain, stress and anxiety, nausea and vomiting, gastrointestinal issues, and neuropathy. All treatments are provided in collaboration with the patient's medical team, and are free of charge.
